Assigning Task Resources

As you create a task or subtask, you can assign additional team members as resources to assist in the completion of the task. Use the Resources tab to review the list of team members available for this task assignment.

To assign team members to tasks:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Task tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a task or subtask in the task tree or list.

    • Select a task or subtask, then select Properties from the Task menu or the context menu.

    The Task Properties dialog opens.

  4. Select the Resources tab.

  5. Click Add. The Select Task Resources dialog opens.

  6. From the Users list, select the team members you want to assign to the task, then click Add. This action moves the team member names to the Assigned Resources list.

  7. Click OK to return to the Resources tab. The selected team members appear in the Task resources assignment list.

  8. Do any of the following:

  9. To confirm that the Task resource assignment list is complete and correct, click Apply.

  10. To remove a name from the Task resource assignment list, select it, and click Remove.

  11. To add another resource, click Add, and repeat steps 3-5.
